moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone around the user. Its power varies.

moves.name: Steamroller
moves.description: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This attack may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Rock Blast
moves.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

moves.name: Smack Down
moves.description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

moves.name: Stealth Rock
moves.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opponent's team. The trap hurts opponents that switch into battle.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.
